bookTitle: The Mystery of the Invisible Thief
Plot: Larry, Daisy, Fatty, Pip, Bets and Buster are immediately on the trail when two robberies take place in the village, and though the thief has left enormous footprints, it seems as if he is able to enter houses without being seen.
Characters: Philip 'Pip' Hilton, Margaret 'Daisy' Dakin, Buster the Dog, Laurence 'Larry' Daykin, Frederick Algernon 'Fatty' Trotteville, Elizabeth 'Bets' Hilton
